snippet: It was while hunting for monsters in a virtual cave that Bend Henmoko Madio met his community and realized why companies are adapting online video games to suit the different languages, tastes and mobile devices in Southeast Asia....

headline.print_headline: Online Games Go Local for Southeast Asia's Booming Market
headline.main: Online Games Go Local for Southeast Asia's Booming Market

lead_paragraph: It was while hunting for monsters in a virtual cave that Bend Henmoko Madio met his community and realized why companies are adapting online video games to suit the different languages, tastes and mobile devices in Southeast Asia.
